verbose_text: The results demonstrated that FGF21 overexpression alleviated TM induced ER stress and apoptosis in cardiomyocytes by interfering with the PERK-eIF2alpha-ATF4-CHOP and IRE1a-JNK apoptotic pathways, which in turn suppressed the activity of pro apoptotic cytokines, thereby reducing cardiomyocyte apoptosis and supporting survival.
